brief_title: Modeling Impaired Judgement in Cocaine Abusers - 6
brief_summary: The purpose of this study is for the modeling of impaired judgement in cocaine abusers.
detailed_description: The objective of this study is to investigate recognition memory and appreciation of changing contingencies in relation to a response judgement.
criteria: Inclusion Criteria: (3 groups)Normal, healthy controls. Recent cocaine experience. Over 6 months since the last cocaine experience. Exclusion Criteria: Psychosis or mood disorder. History of seizure, head trauma
